WindowSetImmediate.summary:
This method is used to break up long running operations and run a callback function
immediately after the browser has completed other operations such as events and display
updates.

blockquote.para:
Note: This method is not expected to become standard, and is nowadays only implemented
by Node.js 0.10+. It meets resistance both from Gecko (Firefox) and Chromium/WebKit (Chrome/Safari).

remarks.para:
-Polyfill of setImmediate in core-js
-Microsoft setImmediate API Demo
-
-

WindowSetImmediate.returns: The ID of the immediate which can be used later with .
